content.description: Warden climbs the steep face that rises right out of the creek-bed opposite the Guard Tower.  It is presently the only climb on the wall and can easily be recognized by having two sets of chains up top.  The route is very steep, even overhanging at points, but with big jugs at almost every move. Short and fun.  Beware of falling early and hitting the rock ledge at the bottom of the climb.  Also, some of the larger holds look like they might not last forever, so beware of those too.
content.protection: This route has four bolts, and not one, but two sets of anchors!

content.description: Probation climbs the cracks and corners at the left-hand side of the "Guard Tower".  This formation is on the right side of the creek as you walk down it, just before the Cell Blocks.  Look for a steep wall with a single bolted route (Warden, 5.7), that comes all the way down to the creek-bed on the left side.  The Guard Tower is opposite this, with climbs starting 15 ft. out of the creek bottom.  Probation is an easy route up the vegetated and somewhat grungy cracks on the left side of the wall.  The climbing is easy and serves as a nice way to top-rope Parole (5.10+).
content.protection: There are two bolts on this route.  Easy climbing protects with small/medium nuts and cams.  There are chains up top.

content.description: Center route on the guard tower formation. This route is pretty fun on TR, not sure how the pro in the crack is, and maybe a fun lead if the bolt had a hanger. Thin moves up to a crack and a tricky crux to reach above the roof, then a fun pull over it.
content.protection: Bolt (missing hanger) + a few gear placements, chains up top

content.description: Far right route on the guard tower. Not much going on here, but worth it to TR the 10+ center route maybe. Basically climb arete until a steep move to pull the ledge, then traverse far left for chains. The follower may not like the ledge pull if it is close to ability level since there might be a big pedulum if no other protection was placed up top, but once on the ledge, it is 5.4 moves or so.
content.protection: a couple bolts, maybe a cam or two. Chains up top

content.description:
Three moderate traditional and mixed lines ascend a fifty foot grungy-looking face.  This wall faces southeast and sees little traffic. 

Warden, the sport line across the wash, is frequently climbed by parties as a warm-up or cool-down despite the odd bolting and less-than-inspiring rock.
